reviewDescription: We have 4 animals so we’ve bought a few at different times. The oldest one is about 2 years old and still works perfectly fine. You can ding the collar to find it if it comes off or find you animal when they hide. Our cats like to pretend they are jungle cats so sometimes we can’t see them in taller bushes or they’ve lost their collars and we’ve had to retrieve them, this is very convenient and useful. Easy to set up, light, value for the money, easy to connect and monitor.
reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2026
